column4: is there a known problem with xorg not working on default installs of Breezy?
i have never had a problem but linux does different things with different hardware
yeah. it's just that it works flawlessly on Hoary, but a clean install of Breezy won't do diddly with xorg
did Hoary use xorg or xfree86?
not sure i didnt use hoary for maor than a week
